English: Tip: Use all your birds! More birds on the board means more options on every turn.
Chinese: 有时六博快壮心，绕床三匝呼一掷。

English: Tip: Use the whole board. Send some birds through the middle, and some around the outside.
Chinese: 簙，局戏也，六箸十二棋也。

English: Tip: Your birds must work together. Keep them in groups of two or three.
Chinese: 菎蔽象棋，有六博些。分曹并进，遒相迫些。成枭而牟，呼五白些。

English: Tip: Owls by themselves are likely to be captured. Use your other birds to protect them!
Chinese: 博也者贵枭，胜者必杀枭。是杀其所贵也，儒者以为害义，故不博。

English: Tip: Rolls of 1 and 2 are three times more likely than 3 and 4! Use this to estimate your chances.
Chinese: 棋行到处即竖之，名为骁棋，即入水食鱼，亦名牵鱼。

English: Tip: Have fun! Liubo's mix of strategy and randomness means there is no one perfect strategy.
Chinese: 每一牵鱼获二筹，翻一鱼获三筹。若已牵两鱼而不胜者，名曰被翻双鱼，彼家获六筹，为大胜也。
